Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/Wellington
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett: due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 63rd
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 63rd due to track conditions. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 63rd due to track conditions. Crews working to restore service.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area. Shuttle buses are available between 95th and Roosevelt to provide connecting service. At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus #29 state, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with delays.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with delay. 95th bound trains are being turned at Roosevelt for restoration of service to provide service to Howard.

Purple line trains are running local between Belmont and Howard.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
